uvi.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.14.10
uvi.description:
ipack: ipoctal: fix stack information leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 0a9c36a2e06a249acbed64e8e0b84637c2ad7575, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit ba4dc61fe8c545a5d6a68b63616776556b771f51. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipack: ipoctal: fix stack information leak
